Name: Core-file Status
Description: check core file generated in system
Pass Criteria: no core file generated with in config variable COREFILE_THRESHOLD_MIN

Name: Peer IP / VNF
Command: /bin/bash -c \"echo 'show table sys platform peer_vnf | nomore' | cli; echo 'show table sys platform peer_ip | nomore' | cli\";
Pass Criteria: All VNF ID's should be available in both and match CMS inventory. Note: If CMS_INVENTORY_FILE_PULL ==0 it will only check VNF ids in peer_vnf and peer_ip. Multiple LvnID found All the peer_vnf_lvnid should match with vnfid of readShm or *SDNS*.

Name: VNF Active Alarm
Command: /bin/bash -c \"echo 'show active-alarms| nomore' |cli\"; [ Checks for severity in the alarms]
Pass Criteria: This check will pass if the severity alarm count is empty.

Name: Ovld Error
Pass Criteria: ovld error status should be zero
